body:
Hi guys,
I am a gold member of Avicus and have been playing for a very long time. I got banned recently for advertising. I didn't realise at the time that you could be banned for talking about other servers, only telling others to join. I then got unbanned but soon banned again on the 3rd September for no reason what so ever. I love Avicus and I don't want to stop playing because of this. I have also payed for my gold ranking and I little unfair and I am a frequent player on the server. Hope you can understand where I am coming from. I will not ad again and if I do, fair enough I will understand if you ban me.
Thanks,
Ed879
